name: Walking Zombie - The Dead Skeleton Escape
name_original: Walking Zombie - The Dead Skeleton Escape
description:
A brand new zombie game which you will love! And it is 100% FREE!

Walking Zombie - The Dead Skeleton Escape is a fun and entertaining game which will make your day so much better!

Get extra point by collecting coins. Jump from one platform to another with just an easy touch! Double tap for double jump.

Walking Zombie - The Dead Skeleton Escape is a running game where you need to get as far as possible.

Be careful - as further you get - as faster the walking zombie will run!

Get as many points possible and be on the top of the leaderboard!

Challenge your friends to play and have double fun!

Walking Zombie - The Dead Skeleton Escape is waiting just for you!

Become the master of this game. If you zombies, skeletons and dead monsters, you will love this game!

Leave a rating if you like this game!
